about_the_game:
Elevate your Dungeon Defenders II experience to the stars with the Celestial Vault Pack! By acquiring this pack, you’ll not only show your support for the game but also gain our cosmic gratitude and celestial commendation.

This pack may only be purchased once per account. To redeem the items contained in the pack, visit and interact with the Mailbox in the Heroes Marketplace or Private Tavern.

This pack contains:

13000 Gems to purchase Heroes, Flair, Costumes, and more. (10,000 + 3,000 Extra Gems!)

10 Mythical Defender Packs to gain any number of cosmetic rewards to look your best!

Three Shard Packs from Campaign and every level of Chaos (33 total!) to equip unique bonuses to your heroes and defenses.

Legendary Katkarot Pet to achieve ultimate levels of power!

Legendary Autumeow Pet to wreck your enemies with natural power.
